verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come, Holy Spirit, come
And fill me up, O Lord
Anoint me with Your oil

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Purify my heart
And wash me inside
Renew my mind
Restore my soul, my life
Almighty God

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Purify my heart
And wash me inside
Renew my mind
Restore my soul, my life
I want to know You more
O Lord, I want to Know You more
